Topic: Math
Question: There is well of depth 30m and frog is at bottom of the well. He jumps 3m up one day and falls back 2m down the same day. How many days will it take for the frog to come out of the well?
Choices:
  A: 25 days
  B: 26 days
  C: 27 days
  D: 28 days
  E: 29 days

  Thought: The frog will take 26 days to come out of the well.

Explanation:
The frog started at the bottom of the well, which is 30m deep. On the first day, it jumped 3m up, so it was at a depth of 27m. On the second day, it fell back 2m down, so it was at a depth of 29m. Since the frog started at the bottom of the well, it will take 26 days to reach the top.

Action: Answer("B")

 --- 
Correct Answer: D
